Summary: Pulsating large and silent orange/red object.
divs: sighting detailsobserved very bright round\oval light which was vibrant orange\red in color. it was extremely low on horizen as i first noticed it move very slowly from the west (over gulf of mexico) towards the east as i sat in my condo on the lanai facing west. there was very light low cloud cover at the time. this object did not blink on and off, but rather "pulsed" very slowly as it moved towards us. it was below the clouds and therefore quite low to the ground. no shape was discernable other than the bright orange\red glow it gave off. the object moved directly towrds my condo building extremely slowly, pausing a bit, and then continuing eastward towards us. as it came directly overhead it slowed. the eerie thing was that there was absolutely no sound whatsoever. it then moved straight up through the cloud above it, again with no sound, only the pulsing of the orange\red glow. this was also seen by my wife, daughter and son-in-law. we ran outside immediately but could not see the object no matter where we looked. as i first noticed this object i was aware of its' large size and odd color compared with the lights of a plane or bright stars. following this event we all felt strongly that we had observed something highly unusual. we all agreed this was not a plane, star, flare or firework. at first sight it was approximately the size of a golf ball at arms length. when above us it was approximately the size of a semi-truck tire at arms length.
